FAQ / Wave 4 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Valuable Contract

  1. Do I have to show my opponent which card I’m putting into my hand? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Your opponent is allowed to see the card and verify it has exactly 1 star.
  2. Say I upgrade a character that already has a Bounty ability with Valuable Contract. If it does enough attack damage to an enemy to KO it, what happens? [Source: WotC]
    In that case, you’ll get to use both Bounty abilities in either order. You can’t use the character’s Bounty ability twice or Valuable Contract’s Bounty ability twice though.
  3. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    Optimus Prime - Dark Awakening     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    In bot mode, Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening gains the benefits of his faction Upgrade ability as long as the faction Upgrades on him aren’t Autobot or Quintesson.
    As of this (FAQ's) writing, these are all the faction Upgrades that Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening can utilize to buff your team.
    Autobot:

    • Any Autobot Upgrade, though Noble’s Blaster also has a [G] pip


    Decepticon:

    • Electro-Optical Visor

    • Energon Mace

    • Fusion Cannon of Megatron

    • Hazardous Shield

    • Null-Ray of Starscream


    Mercenary:

    • Black Mail (Wave BFA)

    • Dutch (Wave BFA)

    • Subcontractor Agreement (Wave BFA)

    • Valuable Contract


    Quintesson:

    • Any valid Quintesson Upgrade
